alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flagler, northeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Satsuma, or 7 miles southwest of Palatka, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Fruitland, Satsuma, San Mateo, Welaka, Lake Como and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
